#summary UseCase: LeaveClass

==UseCases==


= LeaveClass =


|| Use Case || LeaveClass ||
||Identified || S2 ||
|| Description: || The LeaveClass use case models a Student removing membership status for a Class. ||
||Actors|| Student||
|| Preconditions: || 1. Student must be successfully logged in via the LogIn use case. ||
||Flow of Events: ||1. The use case starts when a Student selects View Active Classes.||
||                ||2. The system will display a list of the Classes of which the Student is currently registered for. ||
||                ||3. The Student will select the "Drop Class" option next to the specific class which the user desires to drop. ||
||                ||4. The system will display a confirmation/warning message, asking the Student to confirm the action. ||
||                ||4.1 The Student chooses "Confirm".  The system will display a message, telling him the Class has been successfully dropped. ||
||                ||4.2 The Student chooses "Cancel".  ||
||                ||5. The Student will be returned to the View Active Classes screen.  ||
||Post Condition:|| 1. The dropped Class, if it was dropped, will no longer be displayed on the screen, and the Student will no longer receive automated messages pertaining to the dropped Class.||
